member.name: IDCompositionBlendEffect.SetMode
member.summary: Sets the blend mode to use when the blend effect combines the two images.
member.param: The blend mode to use when the blend effect combines the two images.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionBlendEffect
member.summary: The Blend Effect is used to combine 2 images.
